Two sides of a triangle have lengths $10$ and $15$.  The length of the altitude to the third side is the average of the lengths of the altitudes to the two given sides.  How long is the third side?\\
\\
$\textbf{(A) }6\qquad
\textbf{(B) }8\qquad
\textbf{(C) }9\qquad
\textbf{(D) }12\qquad
\textbf{(E) }18\qquad$
